::: {#about-me}
I'm a senior researcher and data scientist in the [sport psychology lab](https://www.sportwissenschaft.uni-konstanz.de/schueler/schueler/research/sport-psychology-lab/) at the University of Konstanz, Germany. My interestes include human motivation, effort, and performance in basic and applied research. I passionately use R for data science and in my general workflow.
:::
